alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:32AM CST until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Oakford affecting Menard, Cass and Mason Counties. Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .An ice jam is ongoing west of Oakford. Expect levels to remain elevated near and upstream of the ice jam until the ice jam breaks up. Rapid fluctuations of several feet remain possible both upstream and downstream of the jam. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 459.9 feet, Flooding begins to impact some residences in Chandlerville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 457.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Friday was 457.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 458.9 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 457.9 Fri 10 am CS 458.8 458.9 458.8 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
